definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: They could do that using plywood and a seat out of an existing airplane.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能用胶合板和其它现有飞机的座椅进行试验。

sentences.english: Both seat backs recline as well.
sentences.chinese: 这两个座椅靠背放倒也。

sentences.english: How should I recline my seat?
She doesn't end the mask stuck to Comus' chair.
sentences.chinese: 她并未理会粘在科玛斯座椅上的面具。

sentences.english: Apparently the company also paid attention to the design.
sentences.chinese: 该公司显然也很注重座椅的外观设计。

sentences.english: Mahouts, (elephant drivers) tie wooden seats on the elephants' backs, then head into the park.
sentences.chinese: 管象人将木制座椅绑在象背上，然后走向公园。

sentences.english: Install screws attaching seat function switch to seat trim panel.
sentences.chinese: 安装连接座椅功能开关至座椅饰板的螺钉。

sentences.english: Install screws attaching seat function switch to seat trim panel.
sentences.chinese: 安装连接座椅功能开关至座椅饰板的螺钉。

sentences.english: Only buy a new child seat.
sentences.chinese: 只买了一个新的儿童座椅。

sentences.english: Fixed back seats lack a pass-through for long objects.
sentences.chinese: 固定靠背座椅缺乏长期的对象一个传递。

sentences.english: A love seat is a wide chair.
sentences.chinese: 爱情座椅是一种宽大的椅子。

sentences.english: Ideally, your buttocks should be right at the back of your chair seat.
sentences.chinese: 正确的坐姿是，你的臀部应当紧挨着座椅的后背。

sentences.english: Stapp became a strong early proponent of automobile seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 斯塔普是力主在汽车上采用座椅安全带的早期创导者。

sentences.english: Even in the choice of baby car seat, you must be very careful.
sentences.chinese: 即使在选择婴儿汽车座椅，你必须非常小心。

sentences.english: Position the seatback in the full forward or full recline position.
sentences.chinese: 在尽量向前或倾斜的位置安置座椅。

sentences.english: You can use this chair as ordinary one.
sentences.chinese: 您可将它当作普通座椅使用。

definition: glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
